'''"Tabletop Troupe Pros" - Take Part in the Event to Win Primogems!''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 4.7]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===

===How to Participate===
====X (Twitter)====
*Click the name tag icon at the bottom of the post and select the role you want to play in the Tabletop Troupe. Submit your work with the hashtag #TabletopTroupePros to enter the prize draw!

====Other Platforms====
*Select the role you want to play in the Tabletop Troupe, then post it with the hashtag #TabletopTroupePros and your Genshin Impact UID. Set the post to public, and you'll be in for the lucky draw!
